arts.ttl: A superb point for Mallorca in Bilbao
arts.sum: Athletic Club (Bilbao) and Real Mallorca shared the spoils 1-1 in a game lacking in quality where nothing much happened in the first hour. However, Mallorca’s goal celebrations were short-lived with Bilbao equalising 90 seconds later.

arts.ttl: Why Oihan Sancet was absent for Athletic Club’s meeting with Mallorca
arts.sum: An explanation for the surprise absence of star midfielder Oihan Sancet from Athletic Club’s latest matchday squad has on Sunday evening been provided. Athletic marked their return to action a…

arts.ttl: ‘The ultimate attacker’ – Nico Williams reveals admiration for Kylian Mbappé
arts.sum: Athletic Club star Nico Williams has this weekend moved to reveal his appreciation for the talents of Real Madrid counterpart Kylian Mbappé. Frontman Mbappé, for his part, is of course…

Athletic Club's unbeaten run in La Liga came to an end earlier this month after suffering a defeat against Atletico Madrid, before also going down to a 2-1 loss against Roma in the Europa League. The ...

arts.ttl: €100m bid could CHANGE EVERYTHING for Nico Williams
arts.sum: Arsenal and Chelsea remain keen, while the admiration from Barcelona remains, although the links have somewhat cooled as Raphinha is enjoying a stunning season. Indeed, Relevo now reports that Saudi giants Al-Hilal made a €100 million bid for the winger last year, offering him an eye-watering €15m-per-season salary.

arts.ttl: Arsenal target Nico Williams explains transfer snub and surprise Premier League role model
arts.sum: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta is a huge fan of Athletic Bilbao star Nico Williams but any summer transfer could prove difficult because of the player's love for the Basque club

arts.ttl: ‘I loved him at Crystal Palace’ – Nico Williams names Wilfried Zaha as inspiration

arts.ttl: Athletic Club star suffers hamstring injury ahead of Mallorca matchup
